C

Cell - Class in battleship
a cell in the battleship game, it can contains a ship... or not and can have been shot... or not
Cell() - Constructor for class battleship.Cell
creates an empty cell never shot

D

Direction - Interface in battleship.direction
represents a direction for "moves" it is possible to know the next position when you "move" in this direction
display(boolean) - Method in class battleship.Sea
displays the board line by line and cell by cell, the display changes for the defender or the opponent, defined by the defender argument

G

Game - Class in battleship

getCharacter(boolean) - Method in class battleship.Cell
provides a character depending of the cell's state : empty, with a hit ship, a safe ship or unknown
getLife() - Method in class battleship.Ship
returns the lifepoints attribute value of the ship.
